Summary: large boomerang--object--floating (quietly) from North to South
divs: Sighting DetailsAs I was walking to my automobile to go to work--I looked up (as I usually do,as I'm always watching the sky,especially at night )I looked up and there was a LARGE U.F.O. FLOATING over the city of Cleveland GA. It was moving from North to the South,slowly,and quietly. I watched for only a short time,as I had to get to work in Gainesville GA. I was surprised at how calm I was. It seemed to be a MATALIC GREY (but it was still dark outside so I couldn't be sure of color ! The LIGHTS from a shopping center was reflecting off of it ,and without that I don't know if I would have even noticed IT at all. I can't say ! There isn't much more to say about the incident. I seemed to just take everything in stride,as if these things happened to me every day (which they don't)
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Cleveland
There were no other sightings in Cleveland on or around November 30th 1998
